titles.title: To authorize the Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to award grants to eligible counties for the use of mobile clinics and distance learning and telemedicine to diagnose and treat children with asthma in rural areas and medically underserved communities, and for other purposes.
Asthma Care and Prevention in Rural Communities Act of 2019
Asthma Care and Prevention in Rural Communities Act of 2019
Asthma Care and Prevention in Rural Communities Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
